name: Pistachio Ice Cream
keywords: dessert, half and half, heavy cream, pistachio, winter
recipeIngredient: 3 ounces finely ground unsalted pistachio nuts

recipeInstructions.text: Mix pistachios, sugar and yolks. Bring half and half to boil; pour into pistachio mixture. Stir over medium heat until mixture thickens. Do not boil.
Strain; cool. Add cream, coloring and kirsch; freeze in ice cream freezer or refrigerator freezer.
